comments.content:
It would really help to see more characters, but I’m pretty sure it’s [TheAntiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20070227144415/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FK.108375.0.7&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=dese%C3%B1o%3Am%C3%A9xico&sampleSize=4).

[Utopia](http://web.archive.org/web/20070227144415/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125709.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=40&sampleText=dese%C3%B1o%3Am%C3%A9xico&sampleSize=45) is in another category altogether. Much higher contrast, vertical axis, narrow serifs.
yes, you’re right, theantiqua is a much better match
Many thanks guys! I appreciate it - JB01
